com.example.android.funkytasks

Class ImageConverterController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.android.funkytasks.ImageConverterController

  • public class ImageConverterController
extends java.lang.Object
    Image controller allows system to convert a bitmap image to a string and vice versa. Gives flexibility for image storage and its memory when we compress it.
